subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova finished her first match of the year in 55 minutes, cruising to a 6-0, 6-0 win over Olga Puchkova at the Australian Open and showing no problems with her sore right shoulder.
snippet: Maria Sharapova finished her first match of the year in 55 minutes, cruising to a 6-0, 6-0 win over Olga Puchkova at the Australian Open and showing no problems with her sore right shoulder.
